name: Dating A Short Fuse
description:
So I decided to try and make a fugonara (Pannacotta Fugo x Narancia Ghirga) game because I really wanted to try and test more coding. (And draw sprites.) Sorry if my art's pretty bad, I still have to work on it! Thank you for downloading.

You might need winrar to unzip this file if you don't have a unzip option on your computer. 

(Once again, the game's cover image is just because I had no ideas.)
